title: Hyatt Centric The Loop Chicago Introduces Like A Local Packages
text:
Hyatt Centric The Loop Chicago Introduces Like A Local Packages By PR Newswire | 09/08/15 - 04:56 PM EDT Reprint CHICAGO , Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Hyatt Centric The Loop Chicago, the first hotel to open under Hyatt's new Hyatt Centric lifestyle brand aimed at modern explorers, is inviting guests to experience Chicago "like a local" with its new, limited-time special booking offer. The "like a local" package provides guests with complimentary valet parking, two 24-hour Divvy bike passes ( Chicago's bike sharing system), four chilled Chicago -brewed beers from Revolution Brewing delivered to the room, two souvenir beer glasses and a list of other local breweries to explore during their stay. "Travelers are looking for quick, last minute drive getaways that provide convenience and flexibility. This creative package allows visitors within driving proximity of Chicago to bring their car, park it and explore our magnificent city on bike or foot. Hotel guests want to experience downtown Chicago their way - like a local does," said Karen McGuigan , General Manager of the Hyatt Centric The Loop Chicago. "Our beautiful new hotel's location is adjacent to Millennium Park where guests can ride their Divvy bikes or take in one of many in a free concerts and shows after their adventurous brewery touring."Guests who take advantage of the "like a local" offer can pick up and drop off their Divvy bikes at any one of the 476 stations across the city, affording them maximum flexibility and minimizing time stuck in traffic. The 257-room Hyatt Centric the Loop Chicago at 100 W. Monroe is centrally located and arms guests with insider knowledge to make the most of their visit, whether for business or leisure. The 22-story property built in 1927, has undergone a transformative renovation from an office building to an iconic new hotel with contemporary guest rooms, 2,500 square feet of meeting space, a 24-hour fitness center, a new signature French restaurant, Cochon Volant Bakery Brasserie and Bar and a rooftop bar, AIRE , all while maintaining the integrity of the building's roots. Hyatt Centric The Loop Chicago is owned by Integrated Clark Monroe, LLC and operated by Interstate Hotels & Resorts ( www.interstatehotels.com ), the leading U.S.-based global hotel management company. To book, or read the full terms and conditions of the "like a local" package please visit the hotels website: www.theloopchicago.centric.hyatt.com . About Integrated Clark Monroe, LLC Integrated Clark Monroe , LLC, the owner of Hyatt The Loop Chicago, is an affiliate of Chicago -based Murphy Capital Management, LLC, (MCM), a multi-service real estate company. Formed by John T. Murphy , MCM and its affiliates, including Murphy Development Corporation (MDC), focus on the development, acquisition and redevelopment of strategic hotel, office, condominium, apartment and retail assets in Chicago, Ohio and Florida .
